casename: Hua Seng Sawmill Co Bhd v QBE Insurance (Malaysia) Bhd
counsel: Jainil Bhandari, John Seow and Kelly Yap (Rajah and Tann) for plaintiff; Michael Lai and Wendy Tan (Haq and Selvam) for defendant
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Trial/Submissions at trial going beyond pleaded case/Whether court will consider submissions/principles to consider

Insurance/Marine insurance/Insurable interest/Goods delivered to buyer before payment/Bills of lading issued in name of buyer/Whether property in goods have passed to buyer/Whether presumption in s 19(2) of the Sale of Goods Act (Cap 39, 1999 Rev Ed) of reservation of property rebutted

Insurance/Marine insurance/Insured peril of "washing overboard"/Alleged collapse of sidewall of cargo hold allowing goods to fall into sea/Whether loss due to insured peril/Definition of "washing overboard"
